var ensure = {
	'number': ensureNumber,
	'boolean': ensureBoolean,
	'string': ensureString, 
	'date': ensureDate,
	'object': ensureObject,
	'array': ensureArray
};
 
function ensureNumber(vari, def) {
	if(typeof vari !== 'number' && typeof vari !== 'undefined') {
		throw new TypeError('Your variable is already setted and isn\'t a Number');	
	}	
 
  def = def ? def : 0;
 
	return vari ? vari : def;
}

}
